sentences.en: "This is a reversal in trend in a major biogeochemical process that's been in place for thousands of years, all as a result of human emissions of CO2, " he said.
sentences.cn: “在成千上万年的生物地球化学主要进程中，其发展趋势将会转变，所有的一切仅因为人类排放二氧化碳。” 他这样说。

sentences.en: Finally, biogeochemical cycling model of organic related particles is put forward.
sentences.cn: 并提出了河口有机性颗粒的生物地球化学循环模式.

sentences.en: One is the understanding of biogeochemical cycles of closed systems.
sentences.cn: 其一,让我们了解了封闭系统的生物地球化学循环.

sentences.en: This correlation suggests that a warming climate is driving this biogeochemical change, Drevnick says.
sentences.cn: 德莱夫尼克说，这种关联性表明，气候变暖正在推动这种生物地球化学变化。

sentences.en: This paper summerized the research results on the biogeochemical aspects of selenium in Chinese low - selenium belt.
sentences.cn: 本文综述了目前与低硒带硒生物地球化学循环有关的研究结果.

sentences.en: This text summarizes the status of and advances in nitrogen biogeochemical cycling and the possible problems.
sentences.cn: 文章全面综述了氮素生物地球化学过程研究的现状与进展及其可能存在的问题.
